description: Research project. Students completing the course in a single semester must enrol in MRES7018. Students completing the course over 2 semesters must enrol in MRES7019 (start semester 1, finish semester 2) or MRES7020 (start semester 2, finish semester 1) or MRES7021 (start semester 2, finish summer semester) or MRES7022 (start summer semester, finish semester 1).
restricted: Permission required from Centre for Advanced Imaging.
